## VMMouse.dblclick() method

Shortcut for [VMMouse.click()](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.click.md) with `clickCount` option set to `2`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dblclick(x: number, y: number, options?: {
        button?: "left" | "middle" | "right" | undefined;
        delay?: number | undefined;
        origin?: ElementHandle<HTMLElement | SVGElement> | null;
    }): Promise<void>;
```
